name: Reblog: redirect new to old
author: wp-hotline.com ~ Stefan

sections.description: Reblog posts: create a new post and redirect to an old one
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. go edit an already published post
  4. click “reblog” and create your reblog
  5. view the new post
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. go edit an already published post
  4. click “reblog” and create your reblog
  5. view the new post
